title: [Neuroscience] By analysing the fluctuations of different cerebral states, neuroscientists at Synapsy have identified a new neurological marker for attention deficit disorder with or without hyperactivity (ADHD)

[Cancer] Cancer therapy using on-site synthesis of anticancer drugs. Study is the first report of therapeutic in vivo synthetic chemistry being used to make anticancer substances where they are needed simply by injecting their ingredients through a vein.
